More rain is forecast today and tomorrow and the @EnvAgency
says residents should be prepared for possible floods in the south of #Northamptonshire https://t.co/1isqdWTkjw

urls.title: Flood alerts in force for parts of Northamptonshire with more rain on the way
urls.description: Environment Agency says flooding possible on River Tove and Great Ouse in south of the county
